meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice; (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)

phrases.phrase: 나 빼고 먼저 시작했으면 좋았을 텐데.
meanings: 초대와 방문 You should have started without me.

phrases.phrase: 조금 더 일찍 깨워 줬으면 좋았을 텐데.
meanings: 아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 You should have woken me sooner.
Strangers when a good thing happens, and relatives when a bad thing happens

phrases.phrase: 좋은 노래도 세 번 들으면 귀가 싫어한다
meanings: Your ears will be fed up with a good song if it is repeated three times

vlive.korean: [아쉬워] 국물이 더 있었음 좋았을 텐데... [Disappointed] I wish we had more soup. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Disappointed] I wish we had more soup.

vlive.korean: [언제 어디서나 우진 기다려...] 우진이도 같이 있었으면 좋았을 텐데... It would have been nice if Woo Jin was here, too... 듣기 View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 서울가요대상 BEHIND
vlive.english: It would have been nice if Woo Jin was here, too...

vlive.korean: 4교시 끝나고 진짜 몸이 안 좋았을 때 초등학교 때인가? After fourth period... When I don't feel good... Was it during elementary school? 듣기 View video SF9 : 저는 밥먹을거예요
vlive.english: After fourth period... When I don't feel good... Was it during elementary school?

vlive.korean: 아 좋았을 것 같아요? Ah, you would have liked it? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍧
vlive.english: Ah, you would have liked it?

vlive.english: "I wish you could take a picture with him". Right?

examples.korean: If only I had gone by taxi. 발음듣기 내가 택시로 갔더라면 좋았을 텐데. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If only I had gone by taxi. 발음

examples.korean: I wish I hadn’t eaten so much. 발음듣기 내가 그렇게 많이 먹지 않았더라면 좋았을 텐데 (그랬다). Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wish I hadn’t eaten so much. 발음

examples.korean: I wish we’d known about it beforehand. 발음듣기 우리가 그것에 대해 사전에 알고 있었더라면 좋았을 텐데 그랬다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wish we’d known about it beforehand. 발음

examples.korean: You ought to have come to the meeting. It was interesting. 발음듣기 네가 그 모임에 왔더라면 좋았을 걸 그랬어. 재미있었는데. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You ought to have come to the meeting. It was interesting. 발음

examples.korean: If only I could have taken a picture as proof. 발음듣기 증거로 사진이라도 찍어뒀으면 좋았을 걸. DARAKWON
examples.english: If only I could have taken a picture as proof. 발음
